step_feedback.feedback: While the first repetition showed good form, the second repetition had excessive movement in the right elbow and wrist. Focus on controlled movements and avoid jerky motions.
The right elbow and wrist show more movement than ideal.  Try to keep your arm straighter overhead and maintain a smoother, more controlled range of motion.
Similar to step 2, the right elbow and wrist show excessive movement. Remember to keep your palm open wide and fingers spread during the exhalation phase.
Inconsistent form across repetitions. The first repetition showed more movement than the second.  Maintain a consistent, controlled fist and open hand throughout.

exercise_summary: You're learning overhead pumping! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead, open your hand wide, and make a tight fist.  Focus on controlled movements in your elbow and wrist to improve your form. Let's work on consistency across repetitions.
